shortDescription: Sumire has detected DropShip landing pads on the moon's surface so those should be a prime spot to locate the Perseus. There haven't been anymore HPG pulses, but it's most likely gone into listening mode, otherwise it would hardly be a covert operation. The question remains why this SLDF facility is still operating more than 300 years after the fall of the Star League and who is behind it.
longDescription: Finding the Perseus should give us some answers about what is happening here.

objectiveList.title: Time Until the Four-Headed Dragon Arrives

dialogueContent.words: That's an old SLDF airbase... no wonder the Explorer Corps DropShip landed here.
Those refueling tanks look like they are being currently used. The rest of the facility still has power, so look out for automated defenses.
They know we are here. I'm detecting several BattleMechs moving to intercept us.
I have worse news. That secondary pad has been recently used and there's damage on the Union hull. The pirates might already be here.
We can't be sure it's ComStar still in control of that DropShip.
Whatever the case, that DropShip will take off soon.
Last one down... there's definitely something familiar about these 'Mechs...
We don't have time to spare anymore, Yang.
Wait too long and the next blown up DropShip will be ours.
How about we try the diplomatic approach?
Explorer Corps DropShip, we are a mercenary company that detected your transmission. Do you require assistance, over?
Mercenaries! Power down your weapons and surrender your BattleMechs to ComStar immediately!
Now don't be a donkey, we are here to rescue you dammit!
I don't know what you are trying to pull now Slarty, but I'm not a fool.
We're not Slarty's Blasters, they were destroyed by the same pirates...
Enough. You pirates will never take this DropShip.
There goes the diplomatic approach.
Commander, that DropShip is showing signs that it is being prepped for take-off. If we want stop them from leaving, we'll need to destroy those fuel tanks.
We have an incoming bogey, I estimate it will make a drop on that landing pad.
We need to prevent the Perseus from completely its refuelling or they'll leave.
Stop! You are not the previous pirates or the Blasters...
We are mercenaries on an exploration mission and we rescued Precentor Myncyk on the main planet, you idiot!
What? How is she? I want to talk to her!
Unfortunately, she died hours ago in our MedBay from previous injuries. She kept repeating the expression 'dark forest', if that means anything to you.
I think they cut-off the feed... by the nine hells, the Union's fusion engine power output has just increased drastically, they're gonna risk blowing up the ship!
They've released the safeties on the Perseus's engines!
Commander, that DropShip looks like ComStar self-detonated their engines! It's a total loss!
Unknown DropShip incoming!
And the turrets are gone!
I have bad news of the orbital kind... things will get hotter, if we don't finish this soon!
There's an eerie resemblance...
Commander, those 'Mechs are running very cool in these hellish conditions.
You damaged their leader, Commander.
[static] <i>gunshot<i>
We just blew up a ComStar DropShip... if anyone ever knows about this, we will be outcasts and outlaws.
They didn't give us any choice. Not that they had one with those pirates about to drop on them.
There might still be survivors inside.
Commander, that unknown DropShip is about to land!
INCOMING TRANSMISSION.
They couldn't have this DropShip... and neither can you...
INCOMING TRANSMISSION.
They couldn't have this DropShip... and neither can you...
Commander, the Perseus refuses to reply to any of my calls.
